name: roal
description: A Remoting Object Access Layer for communicating for C/S on top of any transport that transfers JSON data.

scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify -s roal lib | uglifyjs -c > roal.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty
scripts.webpack: npm run build && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
